text: Suzanne Tremblay (; January 24, 1937 – September 26, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Montreal. He was a Bloc Québécois member of the House of Commons of Canada from 1993 to 2004. In 1997, she was Opposition House Leader for a short time. Tremblay died on September 26, 2020 in Rimouski, Quebec from cancer, aged 83.L’ancienne députée bloquiste Suzanne Tremblay s'éteint ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Politicians from Montreal
title: Suzanne Tremblay
